info.title: Deepgram
info.description: Deepgram has language AI models to power your apps. Power your apps with world-class speech-to-text and domain-specific language models (DSLMs).

parameters.name: redact
parameters.description: The type of string to redact.

get.description: Retrieves basic information about your projects.
Retrieves information about the specified project.
Retrieve a list of requests sent to a project.
Retrieves the details of the specified request for the specified project.
Retrieves a summary of usage statistics.
Lists the features, models, tags, languages, and processing method used for requests in the specified project.
